inputs.selection_motivation: The S&P 500’s valuation is highly sensitive to the UST 10‑year yield, with a strong inverse correlation reflecting discount‑rate effects on equity prices.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are likely to influence or correlate strongly with the S&P 500 because they affect US equity valuations through interest rates, macro fundamentals, commodity prices, and global currency dynamics, and include peer indices and major macro drivers.

proposed_link.motivation: The S&P 500’s valuation is highly sensitive to the UST 10‑year yield, with a strong inverse correlation reflecting discount‑rate effects on equity prices.
